code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{text:"Good evening, Master Wayne.
